mapper.select: select id, name, pic, start_time, end_time, status, click_count, url, note, sort, publisher_id, auth_id from sms_home_adv where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sms_home_adv(name, pic, start_time, end_time, status, click_count, url, note, sort, publisher_id, auth_id) values (#{name}, #{pic}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{status}, #{clickCount}, #{url}, #{note}, #{sort}, #{publisherId}, #{authId})

insert into sms_home_adv(name, pic, start_time, end_time, status, click_count, url, note, sort, publisher_id, auth_id) values
(#{entity.name}, #{entity.pic}, #{entity.startTime}, #{entity.endTime}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.clickCount}, #{entity.url}, #{entity.note}, #{entity.sort}, #{entity.publisherId}, #{entity.authId})

insert into sms_home_adv(name, pic, start_time, end_time, status, click_count, url, note, sort, publisher_id, auth_id) values
(#{entity.name}, #{entity.pic}, #{entity.startTime}, #{entity.endTime}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.clickCount}, #{entity.url}, #{entity.note}, #{entity.sort}, #{entity.publisherId}, #{entity.authId})
on duplicate key update name = values(name), pic = values(pic), start_time = values(start_time), end_time = values(end_time), status = values(status), click_count = values(click_count), url = values(url), note = values(note), sort = values(sort), publisher_id = values(publisher_id), auth_id = values(auth_id)
mapper.update:
update sms_home_adv
name = #{name},
pic = #{pic},
start_time = #{startTime},
end_time = #{endTime},
status = #{status},
click_count = #{clickCount},
url = #{url},
note = #{note},
sort = #{sort},
publisher_id = #{publisherId},
auth_id = #{authId},
where id = #{id}
